text: Can you search the definition of the word "plethora" for me?

definitions.definition: (usually followed by of) An excessive amount or number; an abundance.
definitions.example: The menu offers a plethora of cuisines from around the world.

definitions.definition: An excess of red blood cells or bodily humours.

text: Here's what I found: "a large or excessive amount of something." Can I help you with anything else?
